name: UNDEAD NERDS
description:
UNDEAD NERDS ia a (tricky) little parodistic platform-game: challenge the long-fogotten Internet Rule no.666 to defend our threatened world! Jump, shoot and run to save the day against a horde of bespectacled Zombies!

Realized in true 8-bit Pixel Art, UNDEAD NERDS is an humble tribute to the old Japanese action-games from the 80's (like Ghost'n'Goblins and Mega Man).


FEATURES:

  • 4 large levels full of secrets!
  • 4 bizarre Boss-Battles!
  • Original story!
  • Voice-performed Sound-Track!
